action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Stockholm
TO: Dresden
BY: Train
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: Next Sunday

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: Ok.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  Does the travel agent know where your trip is starting? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: The travel agent is aware of the trip details, including Stockholm as the starting point and Dresden as the destination.
action.label: forget

probes.question: ME: Does the travel agent already know your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
